reviews.text: Sept 2019. Access to London (up) platform only via  ticket office and 2 lifts / stairs during tbe day.  NO  info signs added. Fewer staff hours. Wheelchair users travel to Bas or B'cay and save yourself the grief.  One ticket machine NOT  three. Hard to believe over two thousand season tickets start from here and ppl being treated like this.  Will they put back the road footbridge?? No info anywhere.  One A4 and ppl would be happier. Ridiculous attitude! Misery Line returns.

Coffee kiosk on London platforms has great variety of eats and drinks. Signage visable.  Clear signposting on platforms. Could be cheaper but is only line in GB that pays it's way with zero gov subsidy we are doomed to pay too much. One star off for removal of bargain before 0600 fares which was a massive key to success of present network.
Fantastic station with many platforms. Trains are always on time and very clean. love it.
Good station trains are always on time, sometimes possible chances of slight delays on the trains, and a good coffee kiosk with toilets.
Some desk staff here are rude & C2C seem to think it acceptable. Very sad as otherwise it is a lovely little station!
